sqlMap.insert: insert into comm_post_comments (comment_no, comment_emp_no, comment_content, comment_deleted, comment_post_no) values (comm_comments_seq.nextval, #no#, #empNo#, #content#, #deleted#, #tempNo#)
sqlMap.select: select A.comment_no as no, A.comment_emp_no as empNo, A.comment_content as content, A.comment_deleted as deleted, A.comment_created_date as createdDate, A.comment_updated_date as updatedDate, A.comment_deleted_date as deletedDate, A.comment_post_no as tempNo, B.emp_name as empName from comm_post_comments A, comm_employees B where A.comment_post_no = #value# and A.comment_emp_no = B.emp_no order by A.comment_no asc
sqlMap.update: update comm_post_comments set comment_content = #content#, comment_deleted = #deleted# where comment_no = #no#
